InfoScout - San Francisco

Hiring full-time in SF (SOMA) for a master data architect and senior backend engineer

InfoScout is rapidly establishing the worldâ€™s largest and richest source of household purchases across all retailers. Our fun mobile apps provide incentives for consumers to snap pictures of every receipt. We then apply patent-pending technologies ranging from computer vision & crowdsourcing to fuzzy search & machine learning in order to transform the item-level purchase data into invaluable insights for brands, agencies & retailers
